name: ModemResetHelper
description: Will help customers reboot their modems.

sampleUtterances.utterance: I need help with my modem

plainTextMessage.value: Okay, let's get you the proper help. Simply say 'tech support' to be directed to a technical support specialist.

Okay. First, let's try to reboot your modem. Press the button towards the back of the modem for 5 seconds. Wait for the modem lights to start flashing. Then wait for a few minutes and see if your network is back online. Did this solve your problem?
Okay great ! If there is anything else I can help you with, simply enter 'more options'. Otherwise have a great day and thank you for being a Z-finity customer.
